description: It responds to complaints about the "noise from cockerels" and "persistent scratching".
title: Jersey government culls 65 'noisy' feral chickens
title_page: Jersey government culls 65 'noisy' feral chickens - BBC News
maintext: In a statement, the government said: "Due to the rate at which chickens can breed it was decided to undertake necessary pest control measures using a local pest control company.
